question: In many countries, the crimes rate amongst underaged people has beenrising. Discuss the causes and solutions for this problem.
text: The role of youngsters decides the future of their nation.In this contemporary Era,the ever leap  of infractions has become a tremendous issue in  our world.There are manifold factors that have contributed to this problem;in fact,it is possible to overcome the problem by adopting effective means.

To begin with,there are two main grounds causing the enigma of illegal acts.Firstly,when youngsters get an interaction distant from their parents,they stand a chance to spend their time with bad habit people.Furthermore,they tend to be attracted to their activities and take them as an enjoyment ;consequently,leading to their bad performance in society such as unlawful acts, violations and malefaction.To cite an example,a recent survey demonstrated that China has less percentage of illegal acts  as compare to any other country.Because they have a keen eye on their offspring and spend as much time as they can with them.As a result, of these rationales Connot be wrong to promote this case.

In order to cope with this constantly_evolving problem,there are voluminous solutions that could be taken into consideration.Therefore,it is commonly accepted that the government should make  strict policies in order to cope with teenagers; all in all,place cameras on any single street to avoid violations.Moreover;equally imperative, that parents tend to know about the activities and friends circle of their children,thus leading to their good performance in society .For instance,improving crime policies and adding topics on illegal acts in their syllabus can help to cope with this bone of contention.As a result improvement in these subjects has brought about more chances to reduce teenage offences.
In the nutshell,the trend of letting their youngsters  do whatever they want could cause parlous problems and the best  measure to solve the trouble is to keep inspecting  their company.

error_list.error: Change the form of the verb
error_list.error_des: It appears that your sentence or clause uses an incorrect form of the verb compare. Consider changing it.
